thread.title: Nicki Minaj Just Called Out A High Fashion Shoe Designer
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj Just Called Out A High Fashion Shoe Designer

author: Diana Bruk
title: Nicki Minaj Just Called Out A High Fashion Shoe Designer
text:
Nicki Minaj Just Called Out A High Fashion Shoe Designer 
#GiuseppeWhatsGood is now trending worldwide. By Diana Bruk Getty Images Advertisement - Continue Reading Below If there is one thing you should know in this world, it is that you should not, cannot, under any circumstances, cross Nicki Minaj and except to get away with it. Shoe designer Giuseppe Zanotti is learning that the hard way. Getty On Friday, Nicki took to Twitter to say that Zanotti "seems to think it's ok to name his sneakers after me but his PR says they won't take our call." She followed up with a savage "LOL." This is wonderful. #GiuseppeZanotti seems to think it's ok to name his sneakers after me but his PR says they won't take our call. Lol. ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ‚Äî Young Black God (@KILLAPAM) February 3, 2017 She explained that Zanotti himself told her he was making sneakers inspired by her and that she wore them on the cover of Cosmopolitan. This was "years ago," Nicki notes, but still. I met #GiuseppeZanotti years ago. At which time, he told me I inspired him to design a sneaker in my honor. Wore them on the cover of Cosmo ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Now, Nicki has fronted Cosmo twice, once in 2011 and again in 2015. Both are great covers ‚Äî shoutout to that "demand an orgasm every time" cover line in particular ‚Äî however neither technically feature sneakers (because neither are full-length shots). That doesn't mean Nicki wasn't wearing the shoes for her cover shoot though, and her tweets continue to make a great point: Just go on google, you'll see all the different pairs he's named after me. Lil black girl can inspire u but ain't worth a collection my nig? ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Indeed, a quick Google search indicates there are quite a few shoes by the Italian designer that bear her first name. A photo posted by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 3, 2017 at 8:36am PST And, so, this is where things get messy. Nicki claimed in her tweets that her people had recently tried to contact Zanotti ‚Äî presumably to work on a "capsule collection" with him ‚Äî and were rebuffed, rudely: Recently when he gave other artists capsule collections, my agency reached out and was told they're not taking our call. ü§î ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Don't care about the money. It's just the disrespect. You're not taking MY call? Lol. Give some money to charity in my name or smthn. üôèüèΩ ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 #RunMeMyCHECK #GiuseppeWhatsGood I got time today. üòä barbz trend this cuz he gon learn today. The racism & disrespect won't b tolerated. ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 And what Nicki wants, Nicki gets: the hashtag was soon trending worldwide. That's why I adore the U.K. üíï https://t.co/7oCVE2GiDg ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Soon, the shoes ~mysteriously~ disappeared from their site. U know what I gotta go. My phone ringing. Tell Floyd, Fif & Mike Tyson to book me for the next fight. Me and Giuseppe. üò© after cb & Draco üòÇ ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Well that's a start. Guess they taking calls now... üòäüéÄ https://t.co/wferAGj2h8 ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below And, remember, Nicki isn't just doing this for herself, after all. She's standing up for women everywhere who don't get the credit or pay they deserve: Women are always shamed by other when speaking up in the work place. That's why women cont. to earn less. Jada spoke up & Oscars madeAchange ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Scarlett spoke on her pay vs. her male co-stars & was shamed by other women as well. WakeUp! This is our work place! Just like u have yours! ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Just imagine if I walked into your office building & told you not to take a meeting with your boss regarding a deserved pay increase. lol ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 This isn't a sneaker. Zanotti spoke to me on the first sneaker. But 23 pairs of sneakers later & u still don't wanna break bread?!?! üò©ü§îyikes ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below After all, she apparently doesn't even want the money for herself. I'd like them to donate to St. Jude's Children's hospital on my behalf. #GiuseppeWhatsGood Giorgina, I don't wanna post your email. ‚Äî NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 3, 2017 And if there's one other thing we know about Nicki, it's that she always gets what she wants.
